name: Sunday (POLIMI Game Collective)
description:
A NARRATIVE PUZZLE GAME

In sunday you play as a man who wakes up in his house at the sound of the doorbell. Who’s at the door? When he reaches the door and opens it, he realizes that there’s clearly something wrong: the door doesn’t lead him outside, but back to his bedroom.

During the game you will be trapped in a loop, walking through your house over and over, trying to recollect your memory, piece by piece.

CONTROLS PROTOTYPE DISCLAIMERS

This game is still under development phase. Visuals, Graphics and Story are not completed yet. If, for any reason, you remain stuck in a level, please remember that you can always reload it from "Select Level" on the main menu, or just select the next level to play.

INSTALL INSTRUCTION

1 - Download the rar file from the Download section.

2 - Extract the rar file.

3 - Run "Sunday.exe".

4 - Give us a feedback!

In some cases it may be necessary to activate run settings for unsafe applications (trust us, it is!).
